txt.en: Medwyn says he'll tell you the secret to successful fishing if you have patience.
Medwyn is pleased with your patience.
'The secret to being a successful fisherman? I'll tell you, if you have the patience.'
Exercise patience and learn Medwyn's secret
Medwyn has a secret: a secret about fishing.
Medwyn shakes his head, disappointed. 'You just had to be patient,' he says

'The secret? You have already shown that you know it, my friend!\n\n'The secret is patience! When it comes to fishing, there's a lot of waiting. And you have proven that you can do that, which is not something everyone can do! Good work, and happy fishing!'
It seemed the time would never come... but Medwyn is ready to reveal his secret
'The secret to being a successful fisherman? I'll tell you, if you have the patience.'
